* She was way too tired now, and she was experiencing enough pain that her 
total logic could resurface any moment.
But until then she just wanted to lay down, close her eyes and drift off to 
sleep. Where there was no pain ever.

With Prowls hand on her neck she felt slightly comforted, her memories 
telling her of varied occasions of when she had been held in his arms.
Huh? She actually remembered that?
It was then that her programming suddenly came to the basic truth, when her 
logic pushed back the beast modes and she actually was able to think 
clearly.

With a snarl of shock she rose to her hind legs almost as if she had 
suddenly woken up from a horrable dream!
Her head snapped in every direction until her eyes fell on Prowl...and his 
damage.
She was just about to ask him just what had happened when she looked 
down...and saw her hands.
She almost jumped back in complete surprise.*

" W...what.....?"

* She looked back up at Prowl with an expression which relayed her 
confusion.*

" What's happened to me?!!"
